sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

Assertion Fix:
HSDES 1012506749: All $display statements are now guarded by named assertions so they can be disabled.
RTL Bug Fix:
Coverage Group Fix:
HSDES 1011706214: Fixed coverage group for measuring empty to full conditions of the ingress queue status for power simulations.
HSDES 1011705958: sbetrgt_received_unclaimed_np coverage group fixed. Was never detecting the unclaimed coverages
PCRS:
HSD 58002: Increased ingress queue size maximum to 31. sbcinqueue.sv was re-written to be more flexible.
HSD 58252: Universal synchronizer has been updated with clock cells and the design was altered to use a latch before the final clock gate to the clock crossing flop.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:
Tool versions have moved check the respective project tool files for version updates
ATPG:
Now runing both Stuck-At and At-Speed tests. At-speed is typically above 96%.
LEC:
Retention cells are now fully supported in UPF enabled FV runs.
SpyglassLP:
Moved the SpyglassLP scripts from tools/upf to tools/spyglasslp.
SpyglassDFT:
Now supported. In the future ACE will be used.
UPF:
None

Validation Updates:

Support for VCS v2013.06.4 added with PHASE2 BFM.

Verification Bugs:
HSDES 1011707368: Files added to ace hdl files

sip_knissues.sip_knissue:
HTML

Universal Synchronizers in the asynchronous fifos when enabled will block scan insertion due to the nature of the synchronizer blocking the clocks. This will be non-scannable until a future release to BXT IPs where a new interface pin would need to be inserted.
